E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 4/6/1985
Subject: Robert Landau learns new position
Robert Landau has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Friday, 5/2/1985
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Joe Davis



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1985
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Wally Bunting



Date: Monday, 5/19/1985
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Axel Lizarraga



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1985
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Christopher Wilmore
